name: Ink Guardian
description: The Ink Guardian is a large ooze with a distinctive amorphous form, capable of slipping through tight spaces. It is resilient to various damage types and has a deep, ink-like appearance.
memorable: It possesses the unique ability to rejuvenate after being defeated, unless its containment bottle is destroyed, making it a persistent threat.
goals: To create chaos and disrupt the battlefield while recovering from defeat.
relations: May be encountered alongside other oozes or used as a guardian for treasure or secrets.
environment: Typically found in areas with dark water or ink-like environments.
strengths: Immunities to acid damage and resistances to fire, slashing, and thunder damage, combined with high hit points.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to bludgeoning damage if its bottle is breached and ineffective at ranged combat due to low Dexterity.
attacks: Can attack with pseudopods, dealing bludgeoning and acid damage with each strike.
most_powerful_ability: When reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a shower of acid damage, affecting creatures nearby.
senses: It has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without sight.
additional_information: Can regenerate unless its containment bottle is destroyed
Deals acid damage on contact or melee attacks
Can slip through spaces as narrow as 1 inch
Explodes dealing additional damage when reduced to 0 hp
Starts as Tiny and grows in size upon activation
test_queries: ink creature that regenerates from a bottle
guardian ooze that deals caustic damage
